page.title: 15SOME SHOPS IN WILMSLOW
page.content: The four{newsagents}in our area sell sweets, cigarettes,newspapers, toys, games and cards.The average number of people that work behind the counter is seven.The total number of children that do newspaper rounds is seventy eight.Over{one thousand and nine {hundred houses have newspapers {delivered} by the four shops.The most popular newspaper is the{Telegraph. The opening times are from about 5.45am till 7.00pm.The most popular sweets are Mars Bars. There are 3{off licences}in our area, they also sell groceries, their best selling products are beer and cigarettes. The dearest thing that they sell is {champagne at about Â£11.00 a bottle,} their busiest times are{Christmas,Bank {holidays and Summer time.
